Package pieces

Class King

java.lang.Object
pieces.ChessPiece
pieces.King
public class King
extends ChessPiece
The King class is an extension of the ChessPiece class and creates a King Piece.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static boolean castledK
    boolean castledK to display if a King has been castled on Kings side
    static boolean castledQ
    boolean castledQ to display if a King has been castled on Queens side

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    King​(int color, int previousChange)
    Constructor with 2 arguments

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.lang.String getPieceName()
    getPieceName is used to return the piece abbreviation (wN or bN here)
    int getPreviousChange()
    getPreviousChange method is used to retrieve the previous amount of vertical spaces the ChessPiece last moved.
    boolean validMove​(Board board, Spot startPosition, Spot endPosition)
    validMove method is used to check if a piece is attempting a valid move
    boolean validMoveWithoutCheck​(Board board, Spot startPosition, Spot endPosition)
    validMoveWithoutCheck method is used to check if the inputted move is legal without putting/keeping the King in check
